nodes.text: A fibercord whip was a projected length of fibercord, which was shot out of a whipcord thrower and used to ensnare an individual or item. A grappling hook was usually attached to the end.[source?] Din Djarin used a fibercord whip to ensnare the leg of an escaping Quarren trawler during a battle on a fight in a bar on the ice planet Maldo Kreis in 9 ABY. As well as using the whip to temporarily restrain Ahsoka Tano during their short fight on Corvus. Din Djarin also used the whip to climb alongside the side of a moving sandcrawler during a skirmish with a Jawa tribe on Arvala-7.
